generalConfigTab.errormessage: Ein Fehler meldung  ist aufgetreten, bitte überprüfen Sie die Pflichtfelder. Fahls der  Fehler meldung  beharren bestehen, kontaktieren Sie uns bitte!
generalConfigTab.passwdweek: Das neue Passwort entspricht nicht den Mindestsicherheitsstandards!
generalConfigTab.unknownerror: Entschuldigung! Ein Fehler ist aufgetreten, bitte versuchen Sie es später noch einmal!
generalConfigTab.passwdnotequal: Die von Ihnen eingegebenen Passwörter stimmen nicht überein
generalConfigTab.highlightPowerSupplyOnMap: Markieren Sie die Fehlfunktion des Netzteils
generalConfigTab.acceptedImageTypes: Only png, jpg or jpeg images are accepted. The image size must be less than 2,5 Mb
generalConfigTab.needUpdate: click here to update your app
generalConfigTab.isUpToDate: your version is up to date
generalConfigTab.updateConfirmationMessage: Um Ihre Anwendungsversion zu aktualisieren, müssen Sie sich abmelden und erneut anmelden.
generalConfigTab.marketingMaterials: I agree to receive marketing materials on email and sms

comments.language: You can select the language to be userd in your platform.
comments.timeZone: Select time zone in wich you are. If you select auto the system will take the date and time set on your PC.
comments.measuringUnit: You can select from Metric (EU) and Imperial (US) unit measuring.
comments.preferedZoom: Select your preferred zoom level when entering the application.
comments.historyTail: Automaticaly loads the history of a vehicle for the last selected minutes in vehicle view tab.
comments.hiddenStops: When loading history the stops shorten than selected time (in minutes) are hidden.
comments.groupVehicles: Vehicles would be grouped on map for a better view of the big fleets.
comments.separateDetails: The option will allow opening the vehicle tab in the right of the vehicle list tab.
comments.lowPowerSupply: Vehicles with power supply lower than 10 volts will be marked in red.
comments.showHugo: Activates the HUGO button on the map wich alows you to show/hide the charging account points for tolls in Hungary
comments.notificationsSettings: You have the posibility to select what notification you want to receive and in wich way.

editDialog.optFuelChNanError: Die Anzahl der Stunden muss vom Zahlentyp sein
editDialog.optFuelChBetweenError: Sie können zwischen 0 und 336 Stunden eingeben

selectDeviceAttributesDialog.selectTitle: Select the number of displayed attributes
selectDeviceAttributesDialog.selectSubtitle: This number determines the attributes shown when a vehicle is selected
selectDeviceAttributesDialog.orderSubtitle: The attributes will be shown in the order saved here.The ones colored in gray will not be shown!
selectDeviceAttributesDialog.disabledSubtitle: These attributes are not available. In order to receive additional services, please contact the sales department!

deviceGroupTab.attachDevGroupErrorNot: Device cannot be attached to Group!
deviceGroupTab.detachDevGroupErrorNot: Device cannot be detached from Group!
deviceGroupTab.confirmDeleteAction: Do you really want to delete Device Group {{ name }}?
deviceGroupTab.confirmDetachAction: Do you really want to detach Device?

notificationTab.errormessage: An error occurred, please try again later. If the error persists, please contact us!
